We require the immediate recall of parliament to consider the consolidated views of all of the e-petioners as regards the following:
The removal of benefits from all those convicted of crimes during the recent riots and this to extend for a period of minimum 6 months after completion of sentence.
The halving of benefits for families where an under-age minor has been convicted of crimes during the recent riots, for the duration of the 'sentence'.
The deportation, rather than imprisonment, of any non-UK citizen found to have committed crimes in the recent riots.  If this requires amendments to any other legislation, then enact that and ensure that judges cannot thwart the will or parliament and the people.
The removal of social housing from any family with a member convicted of crimes in the riots.
